idea-plugin.name: Flash/Flex Support
idea-plugin.description:
Provides integration with the Flex SDK and thus lets you develop content for the various Adobe runtimes. Using this plugin, you can:
- Write, analyze and refactor your ActionScript and MXML code.
- Build applications for the various platforms such as Adobe Flash Player, Adobe AIR and Adobe AIR mobile.
- Run, debug, test, package and deploy your applications.
